TopicTitle: Is thsi possible without a docking port ?

Articles.Content:
Hello I want to ask you if this is possible what Bobcat did in his video at around 22:30 - 22:45

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ZdGZCsOSvuI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

As you can see there is no docking port. Is this working ? As I want to have small numbers of docking ports so I am thinking to do something like this but I am not sure if this still works.

Did he just dock a module without a docking port? I have no idea how he did that, maybe it is the parts in the mod he is using. If you don't want to see the docking ports you can use the offset tool to put them so they only just stick out of the surface of the part. That way when they dock you can't see the ports.
There is a docking port, it's just not a very visible one. It's a modded part.
It is part of the ISS part pack found [here.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81754-Release-BobCat-Ind-Space-Planet-products)
